languages.text: [Ткнуть в одного из клейменных наугад] "Вы так любите рассуждать о судьбе — предоставим выбор ей!"

traits.locale_text: [Ткнуть в одного из клейменных наугад] "Вы так любите рассуждать о судьбе — предоставим выбор ей!"

languages.text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

languages.text: [随机选择一位被打上印记的冒牌货]“既然你们这么喜欢谈论命运，那就让命运来做决定吧！”
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

traits.locale_text: [随机选择一位被打上印记的冒牌货]“既然你们这么喜欢谈论命运，那就让命运来做决定吧！”

languages.text: [Señalar a uno de los impostores marcados al azar] «¡Dado que tanto les gusta parlotear sobre el destino, será el destino quien decida!».
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

traits.locale_text: [Señalar a uno de los impostores marcados al azar] «¡Dado que tanto les gusta parlotear sobre el destino, será el destino quien decida!».

languages.text: [Damgalı taklitçilerden birini rastgele işaret et] "Madem kader hakkında bu kadar gevezelik etmeyi seviyorsunuz... O zaman kararı da kader versin!"
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

traits.locale_text: [Damgalı taklitçilerden birini rastgele işaret et] "Madem kader hakkında bu kadar gevezelik etmeyi seviyorsunuz... O zaman kararı da kader versin!"

languages.text: [ランダムに刻印を受けた偽者の一人を指す]「君たちは、運命と戯れるのが好きなので、運命に選んでもらおう！」
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

traits.locale_text: [ランダムに刻印を受けた偽者の一人を指す]「君たちは、運命と戯れるのが好きなので、運命に選んでもらおう！」

languages.text: [Désigner l'un des imposteurs au hasard] « Puisque vous aimez tant vous épancher sur le destin, nous allons le laisser choisir ! »
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"

traits.locale_text: [Désigner l'un des imposteurs au hasard] « Puisque vous aimez tant vous épancher sur le destin, nous allons le laisser choisir ! »

languages.text: [Willkürlich auf einen der gebrandmarkten Hochstapler zeigen] "Ihr faselt ja alle so gerne vom Schicksal, also lassen wir doch das Schicksal entscheiden!"
languages.original_text: [Point at one of the branded impostors at random] "Since you people love prattling about destiny so much, we will let fate choose!"
